ComicInfo.Summary:
The Harder They Fall!: Kill-Cat faces a foe he has no defense against.
Where Creatures Dwell: Dragon is still in jail and has the face Mako, who is determined to kill him. Meanwhile. Tierra's baby is born, Osgood is up to no good and Brenda Punk is out looking for revenge.
ComicInfo.Title: The Harder They Fall!; Where Creatures Dwell
